titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act.
A bill to reauthorize the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This bill reauthorizes the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act through FY2024. The Act provides services and support for victims of family violence, domestic violence, or dating violence.
